abstract: Coca-Cola is considering buying a controlling stake in Russian juice maker Nidan Soki from London-based private equity group Lion Capital, sources familiar with the deal participants told Reuters on Thursday.
snippet: Coca-Cola is considering buying a controlling stake in Russian juice maker Nidan Soki from London-based private equity group Lion Capital, sources familiar with the deal participants told Reuters on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola is considering buying a controlling stake in the Russian juice maker Nidan Soki from the London-based private equity group Lion Capital, sources familiar with the deal participants told Reuters.

headline.main: Coke Said to Mull Buying Russian Juice Maker
